ISSUE.TITLE: [shell] volume.check.disk skipping readonly volume loop
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Describe the bug** loop ``` volume.check.disk skipping readonly volume 339 on slow-volume-8.dc1:8080 and slow-volume-7.dc1:8080 skipping readonly volume 339 on slow-volume-8.dc1:8080 and slow-volume-7.dc1:8080 skipping readonly volume 339 on slow-volume-8.dc1:8080 and slow-volume-7.dc1:8080 ``` **System Setup** ``` 2.35 ``` **Expected behavior** ``` break loop ```

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: volume.tier.move: avoid data loss when destination volume server already has the volume fix https://github.com/chrislusf/seaweedfs/issues/2001

COMMIT.MESSAGE: volume.check.disk: break loop for read only volumes fix https://github.com/chrislusf/seaweedfs/issues/2002
